title: Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Richard Carapaz Steals One from the Favorites, Isaac del Toro Widens Lead
content:
The 2019 pink jersey pounced on the closing climb to surprise the GC favorites to win the stage and revive his overall ambitions.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 11: Richard Carapaz Steals One from the Favorites, Isaac del Toro Widens Lead on Velo.
author: ahood
